Articles.Content:
The Short 330 passenger plane takes me back to my childhood as it was one of the first airplanes I saw when I was a kid. It was a very reliable 30-seat turboprop plane. We called it the 'bus airplane' because it's kinda shaped like a bus with wings... It also had a more upgraded cousin, the Short 360. A military variant of this plane is the C-23 Sherpa.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Here's some info on the Short 330: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Short_330

Mods used: B9 Aerospace, Procedural Wings, and Firespitter.

Craft file: http://www./view/j6l6w7d1ldb5f2u/Short%20330.craft
